BSGlobal LED Lights

High-quality decorative lights, always give you a warm and comfortable feeling.

LED Net Lights – Easy to Use

Battery Outdoor Indoor Lights

Widely Used Strip Lights

LED Christmas Lights

Battery Operated Curtain Light

D Battery Operated – Long Service Time

660 LED Net Lights

Large Cover Size Net Lights


Solar Powered LED Christmas String Lights Outdoor Indoor Decoration

  • Christmas Wide Angle LED String Lights – Light Up Your Life

5MM led string lights surface is wide angle concave lens, with multi-angle light source, more dispersed and clear than other shapes of light, radiating a halo of light in all directions, shining but not too dazzling.

  • Extra Long Christmas String Lights

100Ft extra long outdoor wide angle string lights with 300 high quality LED, mini beads sealed against moisture, eliminate corrosion. Maximize the durability and practicality of the string lights.

  • Energy Efficient

High-quality solar panels can store a lot of electricity, and the high-bright LED light saves more energy than traditional decorative light sections, with a bulb life of up to 5,000 hours.

Auto ON/OFF Solar Lights String

  • Higher Solar Conversion
  • 6-8 hours auto charge during the day
  • Longer Working Time
  1. Auto light up for 8-12 hours when motion is detected at night
  2. Ensure that the solar panels are directly exposed to sunlight to complete the conversion of light energy into electricity.
  • Note:
  1. Please turn on the lights when charging and the light will not be on when the solar panel is absorbing solar energy.L
  2. ight sensor control, it only lights in certain dim environments or darker. But it will light as the panel covered even in daytime.

Read more

Commercial Grade 5MM Christmas Lights with Multi-function Remote Control

  • 8 Lighting Modes

Combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, and steady on. 8 different light modes to create different styles of atmosphere and enjoy a unique light show.

  • Timer Function & Memory Function

Auto charge during the day and light up at night, 24 hours cycle. And with memory function, retain the mode before shutdown, no need to repeat the settings, saving your time and energy.

  • Durable Green Wire

Thicker and more robust than traditional lights wire. Can withstand the wear and tear of indoor or outdoor use.

  • Widely Use – Decorate Your Life

Perfect for Christmas, party, garden, Valentine’s Day, wedding, home, window, bathroom, festival, holiday, shows, restaurant, hotel, commercial building, shopping center etc.

Lighting Mode: 8 modes

Output Voltage: 3V
Power Source: Solar Powered

Wicked Big Sports combines traditional sports and games with oversized fun! Each game features classic play with extra-large elements. The Wicked Big Sports products are portable and versatile play at the beach, in your backyard, at your tailgating party or at the park! Whether or not you are wicked skilled, or wicked competitive, you better be ready to have a wicked good time! Wicked Big Sports Volleyball is an oversized version of a classic Volleyball. Updated version to allow more durability. This Soccer Ball can be used to play a traditional Volleyball game with a Wicked Big twist or create your own game. The bigger the ball the bigger the fun so let the games begin!
Wicked Big Sports Volleyball takes traditional Volleball to a whole new level
Classic Volleyball BUT WICKED BIG
This set includes: 1 Wicked Big Ball, 1 pump, 1 needle
Soft fabric covers the Wicked Big Sports Volleyball and the UPDATED inner level allows the ball to inflate and protects from damages
Great for the beach, park, yard and tailgating! Ages 8 years+

Warm White Christmas C7 String Lights Set of 100 C7 Bulbs Indoor / Outdoor
Our C7 Christmas Lights create a fun, unique look when decorating for any special occasion. Perfect for weddings, parties, tents, patios, awnings and Christmas decoration. These bulbs will screw into a socket and last for 3000 hours.
Add an inviting glow to your space with the Weather Resistant String of Clear C7 Bulb Lights. These lights are perfect for weddings, birthday parties, and other gatherings. These are ideal for adding a cozy atmosphere, or a charming and festive accent, to a casual evening under the stars.

SPECS
Bulb Count: 100
Bulb Spacing: 12 in.
Diameter of Bulb: 1 in.
Bulb & Socket Type: C7 w/ a C7 / E12 base
Total Length (end to end): 100 ft
UL Listed for Indoor & Outdoor Use.
100 Lights Included: C7 E12 Base Light sockets, 5 watts per bulb
One bulb goes out will not affect other bulbs; built in fuse for safety and the electrical plug contains a spare fuse; UL listed. Perfect for Outside Christmas Garden Patio Yard Cafe Tent Porch Deck Party Backyard Decoration
Long Lasting Life: 5W 120V bulbs last for 3000 hours
100FT Long: 12″ spacing between bulbs, 6″ lead on both ends
For Installation, always mount the string first before screwing in the light bulbs. For replacement bulbs, please search for ASIN#B07W4915SZ.

The Franklin Sports Mini Soccer goal set is the perfect all in one set for any young soccer player! This set comes with the Mini folding soccer goal, Mini Soccer ball, and inflation pump so you’ll have everything you need to get the game started. Plus the lightweight PVC construction makes this set easy to take on the go so you can play inside, outside, or anywhere else! The goal folds flat for easy and convenient storage when not in use. Get your young soccer fan in the game today.
All in one set: This set includes (1) 36 inches x 24 inches x 24 inches mini soccer net, (1) mini soccer ball, and an inflation pump with needle so you have everything you need to play
Practice Skills: This mini soccer goal is perfect for playing short-sided games and practicing your soccer skills out in the backyard
Indoors or outdoors: This set can be used indoors or out in the backyard so you can play all year round
Lightweight and portable: This set is constructed from lightweight quick fold corner joints that fold & lock into place to easily assemble or break down in seconds; The lightweight design makes this goal easy to assemble, move and store in seconds
Folds flat for storage: This goal set folds flat, making it easy to stow and store when not being used

From the brand

About GAIATOP:

Founded in 2018, GAIATOP is a very young and dynamic family with a complete R&D team – structure, ID design, projects, and a mature operating system.

The company conducts vertical development on sub-categories such as seasonal products – fans – heaters, etc. And builds the company’s exclusive R&D team for large technology categories.

GAIATOP Desk & Hand fan

GAIATOP Bug Zapper & Heater

【4000V 18W High Power Bug Zapper】365nm UV light is deisgned to attract mosquitoes and flying insects. Internal 4000V power mesh can immediately kill them. This mosquito zapper has been upgraded to 18W, which can cover a range of 1500 feet, wider than other 15W coverage.
【IP44 Waterproof Shell Design】With premium IP44 waterproof design, this mosquito trap can be used in balconies, gardens, courtyards and other indoors and outdoors places. Whether it’s sunny or rainy, it provides you with a pest-free environment.
【Safe and Environmental Protection】Not contain pesticides, our mosquito killer is very safe for children and pets. Made of flame retardant and ABS material, this fly zapper features high temperature resistance and non-irritating odor. Equipped with a galvanized steel mesh to avoid electric shock.
【Easy to Clean】Our mosquito killer has a hidden tray at the bottom of the device for storing dead flies, and comes with a pull rod to clean the stainless steel high pressure mesh. Clean Method: Remove the tray and clean it with a brush or rinse it with water.
【What You Get】1X Electric Bug Zapper Outdoor, 1X Instruction Manual, 1X Exquisite Box, 12-month warranty, 7 days/24 hours warm service. Any problem, please don’t hesitate to contact us. We’ll solve it for you immediately.

As a new design in 2022, this bug zapper outdoor has been improved on the basis of the insect killer. There is a hidden tray and a lever at the bottom of the device for cleaning the stainless steel high-pressure mesh. The stretchy waterproof shell resists everyday weather and keeps your family safe from pest bites.

Features

New Design Mosquito Killer Lamp

  • Wide range of applications: can be used in balcony, bedroom, living room, kitchen, garden, hotel, camping, enclosed courtyard and other places.
  • The IP44 waterproof shell resists daily weather. The lamp bulb can be replaced for a long time use.
  • Mosquito Killer comes with a 5ft power cord, allowing it to hang free in the yard and aviding the inconvenience caused by the short power cord.
  • Comes with a pull rod to clean the high-pressure mesh, the mosquito will not stick to the mesh for a long time, to keep it clean and tidy for a long time use.
  • Made of ABS fireproof material, the plastic part of the mosquito zapper is stronger and more durable. The internal 4000V power grid will instantly electrocute mosquitoes and flying insects, providing effective indoor and outdoor pest control.

Product Specifications:

  • Input Voltage: 85 -145V
  • Working Current: 0.18A
  • Area Coverage: 1500sq.ft
  • Bulb Wattage: 18W UV light
  • Power Cord: 5ft
  • Grid Voltage: 4000V

Read more

Insect killer no more taking apart the entire unit to empty your kill; bugs collect in the easy-clean tray (remove so they fall directly to ground).

Keep bug zapper away from people, pets and food by hanging high on a tree, awning or anywhere a hook can mount.

Fly zapper even if it is used outdoors for a long time, the plastic housing is also durable, Prevents accidental finger touch

Read more

Note

1.Please try to reinstall the bulb if it does not light up after plugged in. It might be loose while delivering.

2.The light bulb is a consumable. If the mosquito killer doesn’t work, the light bulb may be broken. Please request to replace the bulb.

3.Please put the electronic bug zapper in a dark place for optimal capture.

4.Unplug the mosquito zapper plug before cleaning. do not touch the electrical grid with wet hand or electricity conducting materials.

5.The insect killer must be placed at least one meter away from the flammable substance such as gasoline and petroleum.

6.Since the interior of the product eliminates mosquitoes through the power grid, please clean it regularly to avoid mosquito accumulation.

7.The device could be hanged. You are suggested to hang it 0.8-1.2m to the floor and at least o.3m to the wall

4.5
Price: $49.99 - $26.98
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:51:54 UTC – Details)

Product Description

KITVONA Outdoor Sunflower Light Solar Garden Decor for Garden, Back Yard, Grave Decoration, Lawn Yard Ornaments

Specification: Material: Plastic, Fabric Size: 26 Inches Weight: 300g Package include: 2 x 26″ Sunflower Stakes

Sunflower Solar Decorative Light (2 Pack)Order yours today!

Do you want to make your garden more attractive?

Kitvona solar garden light quickly install by pushing this lights into the ground wherever you want a beautiful illuminated decoration, perfect as path lights and in-ground lights Suitable for the Garden, Trees, Flowers, Flowerbed, Fence, Walkway, Bird bath, farmhouse porch decor, lawn fountain, this garden solar lights Does it all.

Design with warm LED, illuminates paths and porches while showing off the beautiful sunflower.

Simply press the switch to on position, easy installation, No wiring required. Safe for indoor or outdoor decoration use.

Glow in Dark

Kitvona decorative solar garden lights charge during day (ensure the switch is in ‘ON’ position) and turn on automatically at night for up to 8 hours when full charged.

Gorgeous & Realistic

Kitvona solar sunflower light is idea for decorating your backyard, special for spring, summer, fall, winter decorations. also a gift idea for Mom, women friend, grandma.

Maximize Available Sunlight

Polysilicon solar panels used, still work in a rainy day-waterproof. Kitvona patio decor light built in a 600MAH rechargeable battery to keep working a long time.

Easy to install

Installation without tools, convenient and quick. Just insert the sunflower yard decor stakes into soil or ground wherever you want a nice illuminated garden decoration.

garden solar lights outdoor waterproof

Solar sunflower lights outdoor garden

Sunflower Yard decor patio decor

✿BEAUTIFUL & REALISTIC—Simply beautiful,especially at night! Made from new material and the flowers petal is exquisitely designed to mimic real flower. Glow in the dark, these solar sunflower lights make your garden unique!
✿AUTOMATICALLY LIGHT UP—This decorative solar garden lights charge during daytime (ensure the switch is in “ON” position) and turn on automatically at night for up to 6~8 hours when full charged. Perfect as lawn ornaments and solar garden lights Suitable for the Garden, Trees, Flowers, Flowerbed, Fence, Walkway, Patio, Porch, Backyard, this garden solar lights Does it all.
✿EASY TO USE—Kitnova Solar yard lights is out of the box with ease. No addition tools required to install this decorative garden stakes. Quickly install this solar flower by pushing this lights into the ground wherever you want a beautiful illuminated spring, summer, fall, winter yard ornaments.
✿STUDY & DELICATED—Kitnova Outdoor décorative sunflower lighting molded with High Quality Material, Durable and Waterproof for Outdoor Decor Use
✿WHAT YOU GET—100% Satisfaction Guarantee and Friendly Customer Service, 30 Days Free Return & 365 days Free Replacement.

KITVONA Outdoor Sunflower Light Solar Garden Decor for Garden, Back Yard, Grave Decoration, Lawn Yard Ornaments

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $74.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:34:54 UTC – Details)


AsterOutdoor shade sail is a stylish and effective shade solution that perfect for most outdoor living space. The shade canopy provides 95% UV block, and can make you comfortable even in the hottest days. Main Features 100% Polyethylene material With 1. 5m hanging PE ropes (3 ropes for Triangle, 4 ropes for Rectangle/Square) Easy to set up with stainless steel D-rings at each corner Ideal for any outdoor event 5-year Lightweight and compact, convenient to carry in most backpacks Specification Size: 16′ x 20′ Color: Sand/Terra/Cream/Graphite Care and Maintenance Exposure to certain chemicals e. g. chlorine can lead to the premature breakdown of the fabric. Shade sails can often be best cleaned by gentle spraying with a garden hose or light scrubbing on stains with a mild strength soapy water. (Please DO NOT machine wash or DRY your sail)
Ideal Use – The outdoor sun shade sail has many uses: over a patio, lawn, garden, backyard, pool, deck, courtyard, park, carport or any other outdoor area to keep you cool in summer. You can conveniently carry it in the original bag or most backpacks since it is lightweight and compact
Durable Construction – The shade sail canopy is a rectangle shape with curved sides, enhancing pull strength and preventing drooping. The sun sail available in several stylish colors and sizes that you can choose from.
High Quality – The patio shade has 100% High Density 185GSM Polyethylene fabric, with strong stitched seams and durable stainless steel D-rings. The fabric is breathable and 95% UV block, allowing air and light to pass through for a more comfortable space. This sail shade also comes along with sturdy polyethylene ropes
Easy to Use – Attach the shade sail D-rings to your structure with the included ropes. Four 5-feet ropes and an instruction sheet come in the package. Measurement is taken from D ring to D ring, Leave an 1.5-2 ft space between the fixing point and the shade sail to fit hardware or rope.
Warranty – Comes with a 5 year warranty when used under normal weather conditions. Easy to Clean with mild detergent and water, fade resistant, will not stain and tear. For the HDPE fabric of shade sail can shrink slightly, it need tolerance for ±6 inch for each side

AsterOutdoor shade sail is a stylish and effective shade solution that perfect for most outdoor living space. The shade canopy provides 95% UV block, and can make you comfortable even in the hottest days.
